name: Untitled Stealth Prototype
description:
Download Below

  

Reach the End Goal to Unlock Weapons!

 

Controls

This game must be played with a controller. If you don't have an Xbox gamepad you can use a PS4 controller but only if you have DS4 Windows (link below). 

NOTE: If Steam is open or running in the background it will conflict with the game's controls.

 

DualShock 4

Walk - Left Stick
Aim - Right Stick
Shoot - R2
Reload - Square
Change Weapon/Toggle Suppressor - D-Pad
Toggle Laser - R3
Sprint - L3
Crouch - Circle
Prone - Hold Circle
Scope - R1
Pause - Options
Select - X

 

Xbox Gamepad

Walk - Left Stick
Aim - Right Stick
Shoot - Right Trigger
Reload - X
Change Weapon/Toggle Suppressor - D-Pad
Toggle Laser - Right Stick Button
Sprint - Left Stick Button
Crouch - B
Prone - Hold B
Scope - Right Shoulder
Pause - Start
Select - A

 

DS4 Windows Download

 https://ds4-windows.com/get-started/ 

WARNING! Make sure you only download DS4 Windows. The download should look like the following, though the numbers may vary.
